checklist.text: Because adopting a new cat comes with a lot of change for both cat and cat parent, we‚Äôve compiled a checklist to help make the transition as smooth as possible.
checklist.title: Cat Adoption

checklist.text: Congratulations on your new, furry, purry bundle of joy! Now that your kitten is settling into their new home, one of your first priorities is likely to be litter box training.
checklist.title: Cat Training

checklist.text: Every month you should ‚Äúplay vet‚Äù and conduct a careful check up on your cat to make sure that all is well. By following our checklist, you have the opportunity to spot any unusual signs.
checklist.title: Cat Problems

checklist.text: You are embarking on a wonderful and rewarding relationship. We‚Äôve compiled a checklist to help make the transition as smooth as possible.
checklist.title: Dog Adoption

checklist.text: Dogs, young or old, love to learn. Include a reward and these four basic rules and you‚Äôve got a recipe for successful dog tricks!
checklist.title: Dog Training

checklist.text: To help prevent health concerns in your dog, it‚Äôs a good idea to get into the habit of checking your dog regularly for any changes or signs of illness.
checklist.title: Dog Problems
